column4: I am installing Ubuntu 11.10 or something on virtualbox. I am at a creen that says for best results have: 4.5G space, AC power , internet. I have AC power only and the continue button is greyed out. How do I continue?
sure the vm has a defined virtual hd where you can install to?
my vote is - get more space if you use the default install medium
dont blame us - write to canonical if you really think it is misleading
